name: 辜炳達
objective: 本課程旨在引導學生如何以批評的角度閱讀小說。課程討論有兩個重點：（一）小說的技巧：如情節、結構、人物塑造、敘事者與敘事策略、背景鋪陳、象徵與意象等。（二）小說與文學理論的關係：如何將文學理論運用到小說的閱讀與分析。
schedule:
W1: Course Introduction
W2-W4: Michel Foucault and Madness
W5-W6: Madness “Is” Civilization
W7-W8: Jacques Lacan and James Joyce
W9: Midterm
W10-W12: Nadja
W13-W15: Tender Is the Night
W16-W17: Finnegans Wake
W18: Final
scorePolicy:
Attendance & In-class Discussion: 25%
Midterm Exam: 25%
Final Presentation: 25%
Term Paper: 25%
materials:
Breton, Andre. Nadja. Trans. Richard Howard. New York: Grove Press, 1960.
Fitzgerald, F. Scott. Tender Is the Night. New York: Charles Scribner’s Sons, 1933.
Foucault, Michel. Abnormal: Lectures at the College de France 1974-1975. Trans. Graham Burchell. London: Verso, 2016.
---. The Birth of the Clinic: An Archaeology of Medical Perception. Trans. A. M. Sheridan. London: Routledge, 2003.
Joyce, James. Finnegans Wake. London: Faber and Faber, 1939.
Lacan, Jacques. Le Sinthome Miller, Jacques-Alain. Paris: Editions du Seuil, 1999.
